subject: Package
description_text:
Hello,
I ordered about 3 weeks ago from you guys and have still not received my package when I paid for 2 day shipping. Below I have attached pictures of my confirmation and other. I understand these things take time but none of my shipping tracking has updated or anything. Would just like to know what's going on.  Thank you, Maxwell Newman


Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Maxwell Newman,     The logistics provider responded that your package has been picked up by UPS and is expected to be delivered for you on the 12th, we are very sorry for the delay.

Thank you for the update. I am still a bit disappointed that I I paid extra
for better shipping and was told by another support member they were gonna
be here this past Sunday.

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025 at 1:38â€¯AM support@simsonn.com
